name: Dates Beyond Your Comprehension
description:
Finally, a visual novel with a sanity meter. The fabric of reality itself has called on you to date their eldritch horror monster friends for... reasons.  Will your mind remain intact as you date boldly into the unknown? Will you use your new connections to avert worldwide calamity? Will you figure out who's responsible for the death of your goldfish? Find out, in... Dates Beyond Your Comprehension.

Use left click to advance dialogue and select choices. Press and hold left control to skip dialogue until a choice, and press H to show or hide the dialogue box. This game is somewhat unfinished, and lacks a title screen and sounds, but I reached a point where I needed to either release what I have or never release anything at all. There are 11 endings in total, each with unique end art, so try and find them all!
